review: Love my new Fire TV Stick.  My Apple TV stopped working so I was looking for a cheaper device that I could also watch Amazon Prime movies and shows with.  It was super easy to install and easy to use as well.
author: Megan K. Dunlavey

review: just got mine in the mail,im super excited to try it out! Kinda sad i wasnt able to get it at the price that some of u got it at($19) but never the less i think im going to LOVE it:)wll rate again later after i use.......
author: Deadra

review: I had high hopes during setup, but it couldn't access more than 5 seconds of a program.  It blamed the speed of my computer, which doesn't seem to be a problem when I run Netflix through my blu-ray player.  So maybe order the box and see if it will be able to do a better job finding my computer signal.  But I will probably just skip it and wait to buy a TV that has Amazon capability.
author: James D. Taylor

review: it works good with a goodinternet connection
author: william mcdowell

review: it should be easier to navigate
author: Tina Kephart

review: Super easy set up.  Easy to use and navigate.  Loving it!
author: Amy

review: it actually works really well. Enjoy it a lot

review: IT WORKS GREAT ON MY TV IN MY ROOM . I ALSO HAVE FIRE TV IN MY LIVING ROOM . IAM VERY HAPPY WITH BOTH.
